mapper.insert: insert into freeboard(bno, title, writer, content) values(freeboard_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: update freeboard set writer = #{writer}, title = #{title}, content = #{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from freeboard where title like '%'||#{searchName}||'%' where writer like '%'||#{searchName}||'%' where content like '%'||#{searchName}||'%' where titcont like '%'||#{searchName}||'%' or title like '%'||#{searchName}||'%' where 1 = 1
